branchCategory.name: Heatless Regenerative Dryers

branchItem.name: ID
IDW
branchItem.description: <p>The IDW series is a heatless unit that produces atmospheric dew points of -22°F (-30°C) and below, and ISO 8573-1 moisture classes of class 3 and better. Heatless designs alternate between 2 desiccant columns and use a small portion of the dry air from the column in service to regenerate the other column, thus assuring continuous capability of providing dry air.</p>
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Inlet flow rates from 4 to 365 scfm in 17 sizes <LI>-40°F / °C pressure dew point standard, can be configured for -100°F / -73°C <LI>Max. inlet air temperature: 122°F / 50°C <LI>Easy to maintain <LI>Connections: NPT threads <LI>For use in North America</LI></UL>
